类 MatrixOperations

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.MatrixOperations
public final class MatrixOperations extends Object
Matrix operations utility class providing various operations on game matrices. Includes collision detection, matrix copying, merging, and row clearing.

  • 方法详细资料

    • intersect

      public static boolean intersect(int[][] matrix, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Checks if a brick collides with the game board.
      参数:
      matrix - game board matrix
      brick - brick matrix
      x - brick X coordinate
      y - brick Y coordinate
      返回:
      true if collision occurs, false otherwise

    • copy

      public static int[][] copy(int[][] original)
      Deep copies a two-dimensional array.
      参数:
      original - original array
      返回:
      new array copy

    • merge

      public static int[][] merge(int[][] filledFields, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Merges a brick into the game board background.
      参数:
      filledFields - filled game board
      brick - brick to merge
      x - brick X coordinate
      y - brick Y coordinate
      返回:
      new merged matrix

    • checkRemoving

      public static ClearRow checkRemoving(int[][] matrix)
      Checks and removes filled rows.
      参数:
      matrix - game board matrix
      返回:
      ClearRow object containing number of cleared rows and new matrix

    • deepCopyList

      public static List<int[][]> deepCopyList(List<int[][]> list)
      Deep copies a list of matrices.
      参数:
      list - original list of matrices
      返回:
      new list of matrix copies
